string-array.name: themeMessages
string-array.item: Display your products or services boldly. An image-led look to showcase your products, select this if you have already uploaded your products and picture updates.
A clean white approach to website design, this theme smoothly bridges form and function. Smart use of white space makes it a clean, elegant looking website.
A smart approach to a balance between imagery and updates. If you post business updates often, this is the theme for you. Customise the background and it will make sure your updates look stunning.
With impeccable design in every detail, this theme makes an excellent choice for putting your products front and center with style.
A perfect combination of simplicity and detail, this versatile theme is designed for clarity and is an ideal choice for anyone that wants to emphasize their story.
A modern, functional theme designed for visual storytelling. The immersive image gallery makes it a great option for anyone looking to showcase their work.

string-array.name: on_boarding_description
string-array.item: Hey, this is your website management dashboard. Let us tell you more about the product and how to use it to get discovered online. Visit our FAQ section for more information.
Site health indicates readiness of your website for online discovery. These basic factors ensure that search engines take notice of your new website.

Now you are ready for getting discovered online, but your site is not optimized for website visitors. Your potential customers will lookout for more information. Take a look at these tips to add an "About Us" Page.
Your potential customers are looking for products or services. Showcase it to them to increase your revenues.
Manage your website on-the-go and get discovered online, real-time. Your business in your hands now.

Now your website experience is complete for website visitors to discover. Now, let us help you get 20 unique visitors. Why don\'t you broadcast your website on WhatsApp or share it with your Family and Friends group?

string-array.name: on_boarding_titles
string-array.item: Awesome, you are using NowFloats Boost!
Let\'s get some of your friends to see your site!

string-array.name: on_boarding_btnTexts
string-array.item: Take Your Site Health To Minimum 80%

string-array.name: wildfire_parent_0
string-array.item: WildFire is the fastest way to get your potential customers to notice your brand, product or services. It is an inorganic boost provided to the organic website, in form of targeted digital advertising that ensures customer calls and website visits.

string-array.name: wildfire_parent_1
string-array.item: If you already have a Boost plan (organic SEO), you can simply activate WildFire for your category (prices vary because of difference in supply & demand for keywords by category).

A mix of advertising tools, such as Google AdWords, Facebook Ads, etc. are used to automatically create the most optimised ads & targeting for your website. Which ensure people searching for what’s being advertised end up calling your business number or on your website first.
Note: A minimum of three messages are required on your website for the WildFire plan to start.

string-array.name: wildfire_parent_2
string-array.item: WildFire is NowFloats plan with Targeted online marketing that spurs leads and calls from potential customers from the get go. Advertising vehicles like Google Adwords<sup><small>TM</small></sup> or Facebook<sup><small>TM</small></sup> ads, etc. are used to target your potential customers. The content of these ads are created using the keywords and messages updated from the NowFloats Business Website.

string-array.name: dictate_parent_0
string-array.item: A dedicated NowFloats representative gets in touch with you regularly, to know your business properly and updates your website 2–3 times a week on your behalf, thereby saving your time.

string-array.name: dictate_parent_1
string-array.item:
Our representative will first understand your business so that the updates are highly relevant. More so because we fine-tune the messages to search trends yielding higher traffic per message.
Then the dedicated NowFloats Dictate representative will be provided access to your website through the Manage Portal to update it regularly.

string-array.name: dictate_parent_2
string-array.item:
For which plans can the NowFloats Dictate be used?
NowFloats Dictate can be used for Boost Lite customers.

resources.string: The graph depicts unique visitors in the particular %1$s. Note that a visitor might visit on multiple days in the %1$s and still, will be counted as a unique visitor only once for the entire %1$s

string-array.name: quikr_tip_points
string-array.item: Be as detailed as possible in the description of the update. For example, if you are posting an update about a car, mention the brand, model and year. If you are posting an update about an apartment, mention whether it\'s for rent or sale, the area and the number of rooms (1 BHK, 2BHK etc)
We recommend that you post the update along with a clear image
To ensure an optimal experience for all users, you can post only 1 update to Quikr per day
Your primary Email Id is shared with Quikr and you would receive communication from Quikr directly regarding the posted ads
The details of all the posted ads can be viewed in Analytics -> Social analytics -> Quikr

string-array.name: business_app_tips_description
string-array.item: Regularly post text and image business updates
Add at least 4 products to product gallery
Add at least 6 photos to image gallery
Make sure your contact details are accurate
Make sure your business hours are correct

resources.string: Good news! You can now publish your updates as product ads to Quikr.

string-array.name: quikr_tip_on_dialog
string-array.item: Be as detailed as possible in the description of the update. For example, if you are posting an update about a car, mention the brand, model and year. If you are posting an update about an apartment, mention whether it\'s for rent or sale, the area and the number of rooms (1 BHK, 2BHK etc)
We recommend that you post the update along with a clear image
To ensure an optimal experience for all users, you can post only 1 update to Quikr per day

Note: Following fields are applicable only in case if assured purchase is enabled otherwise please ignore.
Enter the most suitable name of your product, so that customers can identify the product easily.

Please enter details of the product you want to sell. Please make sure the information is accurate. Your customers will make their buying decision based on the information you provide about the product. This contributes to your website SEO.
Enter the price at which this product will be sold on your website. This is what the buyer will pay (provided discount Amount is INR 0)
Amount of discount that you wish to give. Your buyers will pay Product Price less Discount Amount while purchasing the product
For Assured Purchase Online Payments only INR is supported. For any other case you can choose any currency
You should use this to showcase products on your website based on popularity and selling point

This is amount you will earn once you deliver an order successfully through Assured Purchase online payment. It is calculated as = Product Price - Discount Amount - Shipping Charges - Transaction Charges
Calculate shipping charges which Assured Purchase will charge you when a buyer pays online to purchase your product.
Days you require to deliver the product to your customer
Number of current product available in your inventory
This is charge for using Assured Purchase only. This will be calculated on Product Price less Discount Amount

If you don\'t want to collect payments online through Assured Purchase, you can select this option to re-direct buyer to your own URL, once they click \'Buy Now\' on your website. This disabled when Assured Purchase is enabled.

string-array.name: assured_purchase_points
string-array.item: You become a verified seller on NowFloats platform. Your potential buyers will see Assured Purchase badge on your website as a mark of trust and a guarantee from NowFloats.
You can assure reliable and speedy delivery of your products to your buyers.
Your money is safe with NowFloats and will be duly transferred with each payment cycle (Delivery + 15 working days) *.
By enabling Assured Purchase you agree to all terms and policies listed on AssuredPurchase.com.
Transaction charges will be at rate of %s per transaction. Transaction charges can change without prior notice but we always strive to make it reasonable.

string-array.name: delivery_points
string-array.item: If you have an existing website with an integrated payment gateway you can choose to integrate that with your product catalog. To accept payments via your NowFloats Boost website, please add the relevant links to each one of your products via the Buy Online option in your NowFloats Boost product catalog.
If you are listed on an e-commerce marketplace like Amazon, Paytm, Flipkart etc, you can use the URL of the relevant product on the NowFloats Product catalogue.

resources.string: Track how many customers you have received from your website. This is your organic traffic coming from search engines, and repeat visitors. These are your most important customers, and will grow over time.
Your social media pages are an easy way for customers on those platforms to interact with you. Currently, you can chat with customers who are reaching out to you on your Facebook Page.
Interact with your customers and reply to their enquiries from across platforms through a single interface. We read through your SMS data to fetch relevant enquiries.
Your domain \'%s\' has expired. Your website is currently running on \'%s\'. Please renew your domain or link another domain to avail the advantages of having a personal domain.
Your NowFloats account and your domain has expired. Please renew your account and domain to continue with service.
If your query is still unanswered, please check FAQs or contact us at ria@nowfloats.com or call our toll-free number 1860–123–1233.

WildFire is a way for your business to quickly reach your target audience and get more customers to your store! It uses inorganic discovery to get you discovered in the top ranking ad spots of Google Search and Facebook Feed - getting you more and more phone calls.
Total cost incurred for this Ad: INR %.2f
Dictate is a service by which, a NowFloats representative gets in touch with you to understand your business well enough, and then regularly updates the content on your behalf.
You can build you personalized Android app from your NowFloats Boost website itself, for your customers.You can send notifications to your customers about your latest products and updates via the app
Note: Business emails can be booked only if your domain is not more than 6 months old.
